articles.content: As the fall broadcast season approaches without a resolution of the writers and actors strikes, conventional wisdom suggests the networks may dial up their reality TV programming, just as they have d… [+5191 chars]

articles.title: Member of local Fleetwood Mac tribute band paralyzed from chest down after Thruway crash - WHAM
articles.description: Rochester, N.Y.— Katy Eberts, member of The Seven Wonders, is now paralyzed from the chest down after her band was involved in a crash on the NYS Thruway last

articles.author: Leyla Mohammed
articles.title: Britney Spears Paying $10k Monthly For Sam Asghari's Apartment: Report - BuzzFeed News
articles.description: According to their court documents, Sam has already sought spousal support and requested that Britney cover his legal fees, despite having been the one to file for divorce.
